BOOSEAppFinal.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSEAppFinal Assembly BOOSEAppFinal.dll Provides a drawing canvas implementation for the BOOSE application, supporting basic drawing operations such as lines, shapes, and text. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) Initializes a new instance of the AppCanvas class with the specified width and height. public AppCanvas(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the canvas. height int The height of the canvas. Properties Height Gets the height of the canvas. public int Height { get; } Property Value int PenColour Gets or sets the current pen color used for drawing. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Width Gets the width of the canvas. public int Width { get; } Property Value int Xpos Gets or sets the current X position of the drawing cursor. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the current Y position of the drawing cursor. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle centered at the current cursor position with the specified radius. If filled is true, the circle is filled; otherwise, only the outline is drawn. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int The radius of the circle in pixels. filled bool Whether the circle should be filled (true) or just outlined (false). Clear() Clears the canvas by filling it with a white background. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current cursor position to the specified (x, y) coordinates and updates the cursor position. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The X coordinate to draw to. y int The Y coordinate to draw to. Line(int, int, int, int) public void Line(int v1, int v2, int v3, int v4) Parameters v1 int v2 int v3 int v4 int MoveTo(int, int) Moves the drawing cursor to the specified (x, y) coordinates without drawing. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The X coordinate to move to. y int The Y coordinate to move to. Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle at the current cursor position with the specified width and height. If filled is true, the rectangle is filled; otherwise, only the outline is drawn. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int The width of the rectangle in pixels. height int The height of the rectangle in pixels. filled bool Whether the rectangle should be filled (true) or just outlined (false). Reset() Resets the canvas to its initial state by clearing it, resetting the cursor position to (0, 0), and setting the pen color to black. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Initializes or resets the canvas to the specified width and height, clearing any existing drawings. public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the canvas in pixels. height int The height of the canvas in pixels. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the current pen color used for drawing using the specified RGB values. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int The red component of the color (0-255). green int The green component of the color (0-255). blue int The blue component of the color (0-255). SetPixel(int, int, Color) Sets the pixel at the given (x, y) coordinates. public void SetPixel(int v1, int v2, Color red) Parameters v1 int The X coordinate of the pixel. v2 int The Y coordinate of the pixel. red Color The color to set the pixel to. Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle at the current cursor position with the specified width and height. The triangle's base is drawn from the current position to (Xpos + width, Ypos), and its apex is at (Xpos + width / 2, Ypos - height). public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the triangle's base in pixels. height int The height of the triangle in pixels. WriteText(string) Draws the specified text at the current cursor position using the current pen color and a default font. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string The text string to draw on the canvas. getBitmap() Gets the underlying bitmap object representing the current state of the canvas. public object getBitmap() Returns object The Bitmap object containing the canvas drawing.

BOOSEAppFinal.html.title: Namespace BOOSEAppFinal | BOOSE API Documentation
BOOSEAppFinal.html.summary: Namespace BOOSEAppFinal Classes AppCanvas Provides a drawing canvas implementation for the BOOSE application, supporting basic drawing operations such as lines, shapes, and text. AppCommandFactory Factory for creating application-specific command objects. Extends BOOSE.CommandFactory to support additional commands used within the BOOSE application. BooseRunner MyCircle Represents the Circle command, which drawing a circle using the provided radius at the current canvas position. MyDrawTo Handles the DrawTo command, which draws a straight line from the canvas’s current position to a new set of X and Y coordinates. MyMoveTo Represents the MoveTo command, which simply moves the canvas cursor to a chosen X and Y position without drawing anything. MyParser Provides parsing functionality for BOOSE programs, allowing commands to be parsed and added to a stored program without enforcing BOOSE-specific limits. MyRect Represents the Rect command, which draws a rectangle using the provided width and height at the current canvas position.

index.html.title: BOOSE Project Documentation | BOOSE API Documentation
index.html.summary: BOOSE Project Documentation Welcome to the official documentation for the BOOSE assignment. This site provides guides, test references, and a full API overview. 🚀 Getting Started 🚀 Learn how to set up the project Explore the main features Run your first build with DocFX 🧪 Tests 🧪 The project includes a suite of unit tests to ensure clarity, maintainability, and correctness. MyAppCanvasTests Validates canvas initialization, rendering consistency, and state management. MyCommandFactoryTests Ensures command creation, parsing, and factory logic behave as expected. MyCircleTests Verifies circle rendering, including boundary conditions and drawing accuracy. MyRectTests Tests rectangle drawing logic, focusing on validation and error handling. MyMoveToTests Confirms movement logic, ensuring coordinates update correctly and invalid moves are handled. MyDrawToTests Covers custom drawing behaviour, validating path creation and rendering consistency. 📖 API Reference 📖 Dive into the technical details of classes and namespaces: AppCanvas – rendering surface BooseRunner – execution engine MyCircle, MyRect, MyMoveTo, MyDrawTo – custom drawing commands 🖼️ BOOSE Drawing Output 🖼️ PLEASE CLICK ON THE IMAGE TO ENLARGE! These examples demonstrate how BOOSE commands are rendered on the custom AppCanvas. 🎯 Restricted Drawing Output 🎯 🎯 Unrestricted Drawing Output 🎯 📚 Additional Resources 📚 Getting Started Guide Introduction Use the sidebar to navigate through guides, tests, and API documentation.
